entry.title: [RBX1][Dedicated Servers] - 16C06 - 16C07
entry.content:
Jun 14, 02:17 UTC
Resolved - Due to a circuit breaker, some servers in racks 16C06 and 16C07 were inaccessible.
Our teams have resolved the incident, and since 14/06/2023 02:11 UTC, all the servers concerned have been operational.

Jun 14, 02:08 UTC
Identified - The cause of this incident is the faulty circuit breaker.
All the servers in rack 16C06 that were affected are operational again.
And also most of the servers in rack 16C07 are operational.
Our technical teams are working on the remaining ones.

Jun 14, 01:53 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 14/06/2023 01:44 UTC
Service impact : Servers inracks 16C06 and 16C07are unreachable.
Ongoing actions :Our technical teams are investigating on the issue.
Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [RBX1][Dedicated Servers] - 05A15
entry.content:
Jun 13, 20:19 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 13/06/2023 19:10 UTC
End Time : 13/06/2023 20:14 UTC
Service impact : Public network was temporarily unavailable for servers in rack 05A15
Root cause : Electrical issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jun 13, 19:24 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 13/06/2023 19:10 UTC
Service impact : Public network is temporarily unavailable for servers in rack 05A15
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
